page.title: 12A Typical Monday
page.content: I am Claire Garnham and I live in {Birkhill.}I live farther away from the school than any other primary 7.I get up and dress at 7.30 am and walk to {Muirhead}to get the school bus. On Monday we do{spelling}then {maths.} I'm better at spelling than maths.After playtime we do{English until dinner-time.I play with my pals after dinner.The first lesson in the afternoon is{music.}Our music teacher is Miss Pearson and I sometimes play the{recorder.}Next its{geography.} We use atlases and workbooks.After that its playtime followed by a recorder lesson.Lastly we visit the{school {library}and read a book. I return home by the school bus and get home at 4.20pm. Claire Garnham P.7.
